chapter.title: Before You Install
chapter.para: This chapter covers requirements for running OpenIG software. If you have a special request to support a component or combination not listed here, contact ForgeRock at info@forgerock.com.

section.title: Which OpenIG to Use
section.para: There are two versions of the Open Identity Gateway, OpenIG and OpenIG (Federation). The OpenIG Federation consists of OpenIG plus additional Federation libraries. Unless you require Federation capabilities, use core OpenIG.

section.title: JDK Version
section.para: This release of OpenIG requires Java Development Kit 6 or Java Development Kit 7. ForgeRock recommends the most recent update of Java 6 or 7 to ensure you have the latest security fixes.

section.title: Web Application Container
section.para: See the chapter on Configuring Deployment Containers in the Guide to OpenIG for details on setting up your web application container.

section.title: Scripting Support
section.para: This release of OpenIG supports the Groovy scripting language. For examples using Groovy scripts for Filters and Handlers, see Scripting Filters & Handlers.
